name: Coil Characterization
author: VIP team
command-line: if ! test "$(basename [COIL] .txt)" = "$(head -1 [COIL])"; then echo "Invalid coil input: name mismatch"; exit 1; fi && if test "$(basename [COMPARISON])" != comparison; then ln -sfT [COMPARISON] comparison; fi && echo "before exec:" && ls -l comparison/ && touch _start && caract_inside.sh [COIL] [FANTOM] [DATA] && echo "after exec:" && ls -l comparison/ reportFile/ && find comparison/ -not -newer _start -name "$(basename [OUTPUT_MAT])" -delete && echo "after cleanup:" && ls -l comparison/ reportFile/

inputs.name: Coil
inputs.description: Txt file containing the coil description with one item per line (e.g. 31P_surf)

inputs.name: Phantom
inputs.description: Txt file containing the coil description with one item per line (e.g. 1.25g NiSO4 x 6H2O, 5g NaCl /litre d eau)

inputs.name: Data
inputs.description: Tarball containing all data images to be processed

inputs.name: Comparison
inputs.description: Comparison directory containing mat files from previous executions. Please set "Results directory" above to the parent directory, to allow future reuse of the mat file that this execution will produce.

custom.vip:resultsDirectoryDescription: Results will be placed in subdirectories: "comparison" for the .mat file, and "reportFile" for the .pdf file.
